phrases: Which match is it right now?
It looks like Blue Pegasus won.
The second match is just about to begin.
It is between Lamia Scale and Mermaid Heel.
Then Natsu and the others' match has not started yet.
Natsu-san said he would come and see you before his match.
Rest up a little more until then.
It is important for you to get your strength back.
Let us feel the love for Mermaid Heel!
Yajima-san, what are your thoughts on this match?
I would not be surprised if either side won.
I am certainly looking forward to this match.
Both Lyon and Yuka are strong opponents!
Do not let your guard down!
Are you rooting for Mermaid Heel?
We have known each other a long time.
It is only natural that I would want to support her.
Gray, you have known Lyon for a long time, right?
Are not you interested in this?
We are in different guilds now and are rivals.
I was thinking that Lucy and Elfman would probably like to see the matches, too.
In that case, let us watch it carefully for them.
So we can tell them about it later.
I have known Millianna since that Tower of Heaven business, see.
I guess I am rooting for Lamia Scale.
They have been a big help.
Certainly, we have a history with Lamia Scale...
Juvia, I guess you are cheering for Lyon, huh?
You have been approached by Lyon more than once, right?
Having a woman's heart, you must be interested, right?
If someone on the team gets injured during the match, and they become short a person...
I knew that you were the only partner for me!
As a member of the guild, Juvia is a bad girl for wishing injuries on her comrades!
But Juvia wants to be by Gray-sama's side!
Juvia does not want her guildmates to get hurt!
Is there something on your mind?
We will give you good counsel, so go ahead and share with us girls.
the next one is between Fairy Tail and Sabertooth at last.
All we need to do is have faith in them.
Let us take a load off and wait...
Everyone, make sure you look before you sit down.
At first, try fighting this match on your own.
I am going to hold back for a while.
Match or not, this is a real fight.
How far can you battle with just your own power?
But if we do not go all out against those two, it is doubtful that we will achieve victory.
That is because Kagura is one of them.
But if I strut my stuff for her...
Hey, that might be a little cocky...
If you do not do this right, I will make the both of you spin!
Will she be okay against opponents from Lamia Scale?
Kagura must have figured she would be able to handle it.
Let us leave it to her judgment.
Kagura-chan does not need to take part!
They are really making light of us...
Do whatever you have to do to win!
Show them how strong we are!
In that case, let us drag her to the party!
The first attack that is landed is by Mermaid Heel!
She is totally relaxed as she fights.
Maybe it is because she feels secure with Kagura behind her.
You are not seen nothing yet!
I train with Kagura-chan every day!
You are not putting up any resistance!
Those two are the go-to wizards of Lamia Scale, but Millianna is not giving an inch!
It seems that both of her opponents are flummoxed
That girl is better than I thought...
If she were not, it would not be interesting!
In that case, how is this?!
So you can produce several at once, huh?
You are just wasting your energy!
At this rate, I will not be able to look cool in front of Juvia!
Hey, you are still worried about that?
This is the only thing to do against a cat opponent!
Would you stop treating me like a cat?!
I did not think they would trick Millianna with that kind of method!
That is Lyon of Lamia Scale for you.
You cannot be too cautious with him.
Are you guys really that impressed?
You have not directly attacked Millianna yet.
This is a tough battle for both Mermaid Heel and Lamia Scale!
Lyon and Yuka, quit standing around!
If you do not win this right now, I am going to make you spin!
What happens if you get spun?
but anyway, it is really bad for sure!
At this rate, we are going to run out of the 30-minute time limit and it will be a draw.
I intended to save Kagura for last, but...
I love cats, but tigers are another thing!
I suppose I have to participate after all...
So you have finally decided to play, Kagura!
An attack that nullifies your opponent's magic, eh?
She is downed Yuka by not giving him a moment to retaliate!
At last, it is just Kagura and Lyon!
She beat one of them without even drawing her sword?
Kagura is an expert with a sheathed sword.
Maybe she would be a worthy opponent for my Iron Dragon Sword.
Even though he had a hard time against Millianna,
going one on one against Kagura...
Lyon has not unleashed his true strength yet.
No matter what, you would better win!
You once went by the name Reitei.
You attempted a dangerous ritual in order to fight Deliora.
That was a long time ago.
Now, I am Lyon, a wizard with Lamia Scale.
But something about you reminds me of the way I used to be.
Back when I was driven by hatred and had lost sight of something...
Let me ask you one thing.
Why did not you attack Millianna directly?
Did you hold back because she is a woman?
Or just because you did not want to reveal your strategy to me?
Maybe you will find out when you fight me!
Is Lyon powerless to do anything?!
And you were You Are's disciple?!
Show me what you have really got, Lyon Vastia!
And we are running out of time...
I bet not even you will be able to escape this!
You can create all these at the same time?
Her ace in the hole, Gravity Change!
Still, for Kagura to use Gravity Change,
it proves that Lyon guy is a tough opponent.
It was not settled after 30 minutes!
Just a little more time and Lyon would have been toast!
Ah, well, it looks like Kagura is not too bothered by it...
He squeaked by with a draw.
This is what happens when you have got girls on the mind!
When you get back here, you are going to spin and spin and spin!
I am going to spin you like never before!
Kagura really is strong, you know?
And I do not think she was pulling out all the stops...
It is the same every year.
Nobody's seen Kagura get totally serious before.
If this had been a life-or-death battle instead of a match,
you would be dead right now.
I am going to train you harder.
The crowd is still pumped up here at the arena!
But do not take your eyes off of the next battle!
Natsu-san, Gajeel-kun, do not get hurt!
Nobody is allowed to get hurt!
Why are you so obsessed with injuries?
And I will win it for sure.
We just went to check out what is happening at the arena.
What were you talking about with Natsu?
Let us make Lucy and the rest happy by winnin' this thing.
I am sure all of our viewers have been eagerly looking forward to this battle.
A fateful showdown between the guild that was called the strongest
seven years ago and the strongest current guild!
And all four of them are Dragon Slayers.
I have been waiting for this moment.
Or is that just a fleeting dream?
It is almost time for us to act...
The Festival of the Dragon King is almost upon us.
The dream Dragon Slayer showdown is finally happening!
I have faith you will win!
I am sure Natsu will be okay.
I am sure he will win!
The time to clash is here at last!
Who will win, Fairy or Tiger?!
All four dragons are on the battlefield!
Fight to the best of your ability.
There is nothing else to say.
I have been waiting years for this, Natsu-san.
I have been looking forward to it, too-kabo!
The Twin Dragons of Fiore's strongest guild are on the ropes!
But I would be disappointed otherwise.
Did you two really defeat dragons with power like that?
I killed a dragon with this very hand.
It is got nothing to do with you.
From now, I am going to show you the power that killed a dragon!
I do not know if these guys are new generation Dragon Slayers or what,
but I am going to kick that blond poser's ass!
And then I am going to beat up the remaining dark-haired duo!
